alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:23PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Showers and storms producing strong winds, brief downpours, and dangerous cloud-to-ground lightning... High based showers and thunderstorms have developed over much of northeast an east-central Nevada this afternoon. Brief downpours and strong winds may accompany this activity, which could produce some blowing dust as well. Also, dangerous cloud-to-ground lightning is expected, which may lead to new fire starts. If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
